name: Supplier List DFM
query:
select
  s.supplier_code as "Code:100",
  s.supplier_name as"Vendor Name:Link/Supplier:100" ,
  s.category as "Nature of Party:100",
  a.address_line1 as "Address:200",
  c.first_name as "Contact Name:100",
 cp.phone as "Contact Phone:100",
  a.city as "City:100",
  a.state as "State:100",
  a.country as "Country:100",
  a.pincode as "PIN Code:100",
  a.phone as "Phone:100",
  a.email_id as "Email ID:100",
  s.pan as "PAN No:100",
  s.excise_registration_no as "Excise Registration No",
  s.iso_registration_no as "ISO Registration No",
  s.iso_registration_date as "ISO Registration Date",
  a.gstin as "GSTIN NO",
  a.gstin_registration_date as "GSTIN Reg. Date:Date",
  s.msme_registration_no as "MSME Registration No",
  s.fssai_license_no as "FSSAI Licence No",
  s.fssai_valid_from as "Valid From",
  s.fssai_valid_to_ as "Valid To",
  s.bank_name as "Bank Name",
  s.bank_account_no as "Bank Account"
  
  
 
from `tabSupplier` s
left join `tabAddress` a 
on
   s.supplier_name = a.address_title 
left join `tabDynamic Link` dl on dl.link_name=s.name
left join `tabContact` c on c.name=dl.parent
left join `tabContact Phone` cp on cp.parent = c.name
